law.text:
In addition to any other penalty provided by law, the county commissioners may revoke a bingo license forthwith if:
the county commissioners determine after an investigation that:
the license holder made a false statement in the application for the license; or
the conduct of licensed bingo at the premises named in the license would:
the license holder is convicted of:
violating §§ 13-705 through 13-707 of this subtitle; or
a felony.
